content: Superb
One of the best sticky note apps I've used. Lightweight, quick, simple & completely unintrusive (no permissions needed)! Well worth the price.
I purchased but there is no app to open this in my phone what the hell is this ? . I can't understand. How I'm supposed to use this ?
Good app. Has no internet access. A transparent widget would be appreciated and an option to apply more colors

Love this, have used the free version (yellow only) and just purchased this version so that I can change colours. Would like to chose my own colours, and to change the level of brightness and intensity. The colours are a bit too rich - especially noticeable when I am reading or writing lengthy notes. Otherwise, a great, easy to use widget. Have used it for at least a year and very happy with it!
Simple easy light... Juat like I want for temporary notes or memos.
Almost perfect. Transparency needed!

Absolutely fantastic app. No creepy permissions that want your pictures and contacts etc. lists. Sticky note looks like you stuck a sticky note on your home screen, you do not have to go into an app to see your note, also size adjustable. And it works fantastic. I bought the full version, that gives you extra note background colors.
Why NO BLACK BACKGROUND??? Otherwise, PERFECT STICKY NOTE APP!
Looks and works great.

I've been using this for a long time, and then I decided to pay for the full version because the lite version has done a lot for me. Very handy widget, easy to use and customizable at your will, but I think things like font color and more colors would be neat too.
Simple and easy to use.
people have been asking for months for a black or transparent background and still, nothing.
I love these sticky notes because I can change the color whenever I change my wallpaper. It's sizable too!
please fix white color, it is yellow'ish and doesn't match other widgets
Does exactly what the developer said it would and it works perfectly for me!
please add black and transparent background, thanks.
Perfect. Quick and easy to use. More colour options would make it even better.

I cant edit the notes unless I resize the app (since its a widget). A bit 
annoying because its a sticky note. Once it is fixed, then its a good app.
Fantastic
Been using this for years, add transparency options as well as more color options and I will love it even more. Best ever.
There is a bug, when unused for sometime or after resizing the widget, it freezes. I can only edit after multiple taps. The widget is good but i will uninstall it due to the bug.
Nice

This is a five star app waiting to happen--once it syncs with Google keep and gets more color options for background and font, as well as a transparency option. I have lost huge important notes with one wrong click, which is why we really need it to sync with Google keep, and the transparency and color choices will just be icing on the cake. Get a colour wheel and leave the colour completely up to the user for extra points!
Most useful app I've purchased. Always the first app I install on a new phone. I use it every day, highly recommended!
Nice! Would like to be able to change the note transparency and text color. Maybe add a few more note colors. I really like it.
Extremely effective. Had been looking for something like this since quite a while.
Super utility, excellent for any day use
Great app. Would like it to wrap or no wrap to window size and have pastel colours.
this "app" shows up only as a widget in my OS and therefore i can't use my icon changer to change it. is there anyway around this?
Excellent. Has everything you want from a sticky note widget. Would like the have the option to sync note with Google Drive in order to avoid accidentally losing data.
So great and handy but please add undo options! I too often clumsily delete text that i cant get back
I can't be without this app
Please add more features such as custom text and bg colour with transparency, load and save feature.Thank you very very much.
Awesome! Simple settings, nice range of background colors. Google should buy this from the developer and put it in all their devices...excellent product.
I would like to see sync option with google drive or any service ,also  option to change text colors and more background colors like black would be very nice on amoled Display
Simple, does what it promised. Would be great to be able to set transparency.
I just had to buy it after  trying for a year.  Serves me well
Love that I can share my notes.
Absolutely excellent
BROKEN
Just a good plain old sticky note <3
Buyer BEWARE! Asked for a refund via email, NO response.
Please add transparency!  Last thing to make this my ultimate sticky note widget.  Also it would look beautiful.
It would be great to make posible select some text and copy or cut
Small, efficient and cheap but gives more features and no advertisements!!!

I started with the free version. Liked it so much that I purchased this paid version. No regrets.  Functions that I would like to be added. 1. Lock mode, so that unintentionally typing won't be saved on the sticky note. 2. Alarms to be set for the note. 3. Private mode, so that the contents won't be shown unless password is entered.  Keep up the good work!!
+ simple and useful, - no checkboxes, no handwriting, no picture embedding

Dear Admin- After payment is successful, app got installed.  But later I can't find my app in phone. When I checked playstore again, it is showing only refund option instead of "open /uninstall"  option.
Please add more color option like black or transparent. Good work!
Would love 13 pt font and more colors. Else perfect!
Now I can change colors. Thank you!
Love the app - nice and simple and there on my home screen. Thank you.

1 impossible to find a no nonsense note widget without useless frills. 2 The notes blue goes perfect with my Tron Blue tech theme and keyboard. 3 the widget keeps the notes even on phone restart. Huge plus there. Thanks to the developer for keeping it simple. Might i suggest a simple calculator widget that works? Hard to find one of those too.
Its the best till now what I used. Nice and simple.
The perfect app, everything I needed. I just want some more background colors, like black

Liked the basic version then bought the pro. Very nice simple app. some observations: 1. Found a bug though. In my tablet (Note pro 12.2) when I unlock the screen (Apex Launcher) the text scrolls down to the bottom.....Cant figure out why.  2. I also have a suggestion: when you click on the note, why does it have to open the app full screen to edit. It should edit in the widget itself. Would be much better to use this way. NO RESPONSE FROM THE DEVELOPER......
Perfect

Use it to easily remind me to do stuff without having to go through a ton of extra steps.  Wish list wise,  I would also love transparency,  centered text,  custom colors,  and radiused corners (I realize sticky notes have pointy edges but you have creative liberties) in the future.
i would really like to have a black background with white letters... and some kind of bullet point button...

Works great,  does its job, but I was under the impression it would have more colors and transparency, disappointed... I second the idea to enter text without actually opening the app.  Then this would really be something. No real visual difference from free version.
Excellent notes: simple and efficient. Would love to have transparent background and centered text !

The best simple Sticky note app if all you want is to jot down simple notes!!   Thank you Michael.  I would really appreciate it if you can include more color options in future versions of this app.  I want more colors!!!  Also it would be nice to add transparency to colors.  Thanks Mike!
best of it's kind

I like this because it doesn't have bells and whistles - there's plenty of other apps that do, but I just want a space to record a few notes. I bought the 'pro' for the smaller text, and colors. I almost requested a refund when I discovered the options are limited to 5 bright colors. I didn't because it's cheap and I hope the author will listen and widen the range. I like apps on my phone to be conservatively colored - a nice light grey would be nice. Or light text on a dark background even better!!
replyContent: The latest update has white and gray!

content: I am still looking for a note widget that you can write on directly on the screen but this is the best one yet. Thanks!
Does what it says on the tin and does it well.
Makes jotting down notes quick and convenient. I like how it lets you put a blank note on your screen so its right there and ready to write on when you need it.

I've paid for this not for what it is now but to encourage the author to keep going. It needs an icon to tap to quickly add another sticky to the desktop really...rather than manually adding a widget. Also...and this would be awesome...but synched in with Google Keep would be out of this world because you have instant cloud saving there for free and it could/would link in wonderfully. Possibly even Google Tasks. Great app...like the ethos.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback.  I've considered these ideas as well and discovered unfortunately that it's technically impossible to implement these features on the Android OS.  Will keep these ideas in mind in case this something changes in the future!

content: Can you make the cursor black?  It's white, and it's hard to see with the yellow post-it (my favorite color).  Thanks.
replyContent: Eva, I just pushed out an update to fix the issue.  Thanks for your patience; look out for it in the next few days!

content: Had the free version. Bought the pro. Great widget. No permission, no ads (no ads on free either)  My only request is that a cursor would be nice. Accidentally erased part of a more not realizing where I was trying to type.
Awesome app..would be more better if add voice typing
Would be nice to have a white text on black option, easier on the eyes in the dark. Or a white background would be great too.
It is simple, extremely light and does not have any useless stuff. After trying free version I paid for plus as my thank you to author.
Does exactly what it needs and no more.
Works as advertised, no frills, simple, perfect :-)
Would be a bargain at twice the price. Flawlessly simple and effective

I'm using this widget to label sections of my home screen on Nova launcher.  I'm glad this app requires no permissions, and carries no forced resemblance to real-life sticky notes.  Clean and simple, the font size selection helps to fit the right amount of text in the dimensions needed.  Overall, great and very timely app!  I'd like to see an option for darker color variants with white text, or transparent background with colored text, but this app does an excellent job of being what it is and nothing more.
